title: Hilarious prank sees groom nearly marry best man
text:
He was nervously prepping for his wedding day, excited but anxious to see his beautiful bride sashay her way down the aisle.

So the last thing Billy Hunt, from West Virginia in the US, expected to see was his best man dressed as his betrothed.

Pat Jones, the best man, pulled a hilarious prank on Billy by donning the wedding gown meant for Sally, the bride.

Just as the guests settled down, standing ready to welcome Sally, in walked Pat.

Immediately the best friends burst into uncontrollable laughter and embraced.

According to the wedding videographer, Craig Stevens, it was Sally’s idea.

“I tried to stay calm and not give it away and to also keep the shot steady,” Craig says.

“The rest of the wedding was much the same, a lot of fun personalities and laughs.”

Source: Magazine Feature
